title: Banned my account
body: I was banned, but I dont no why

replies.body: Ahhhh it looks like your account might have been attacked by someone who was trying to hack their way into it. Not to worry, reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and once you're verified as the creator you'll be back on the Rift in no time.
